channel.title: Cohort Visualization Problem
channel.description: I want to see current month data in the respective previous month but cohort always sorts date column in descending order. is it possible to show the date in desc order?

item.title: Cohort Visualization Problem
item.dc:creator: BalawalAli
item.description:
I want to see current month data in the respective previous month but cohort always sorts date column in descending order.
is it possible to show the date in desc order?
